bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for the Repair and Rewinding of AC Electric Motors in the Petroleum, Chemical and Process Industries
IEEE Draft Standard for the Repair and Rewinding of AC Electric Motors in the Petroleum, Chemical and Process Industries
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P1068_DB1, Jan 2008

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard is intended to be a basic or primary document that can be utilized and referenced by owners of AC motors and generators (machines) that need refurbishment, repair, and/or rewinding, as well as service or repair facilities. It has been developed for the Petroleum, Chemical and Process industries, and may be adapted to other areas of interest. The use of this standard is expected to result in higher quality and more cost effective, and timely repairs. It also provides a means of evaluating work performed and repair or service facilities.
